semantic_identifier: 147: feat: Add configurable compliance checklist to deployment readiness and issue payloads

sections.text:
## Description

This PR introduces a lightweight, configurable compliance requirements checklist that can be attached to an issue/theme and enforced as part of deployment readiness.

Changes:
- Adds a new checklist model (e.g., `complianceChecklist`) with a set of items (security review, DPA, retention constraints) where each item has: `key`, `label`, `required`, `status` (pending/complete/waived), optional `notes`, and `updatedAt/updatedBy`.
- Extends the issue/theme schema to store an attached checklist instance and exposes a derived `complianceBlockers`/`complianceReady` flag based on required items.
- Updates deployment readiness evaluation to fail readiness when any required checklist item is not complete (waived items do not block).
- Exposes checklist summary + blocking status in the issue API response and in the downstream engineering link payload (Jira/Linear metadata) so teams see compliance blockers earlier.
- Adds basic validation and defaults: if no checklist is attached, behavior is unchanged; if attached, required items default to `pending`.

Notes for users:
- Teams can attach a checklist to an issue/theme and mark specific items as required; readiness will reflect required-item completion.
- No workflow changes for issues without an attached checklist.

Testing:
- Adds unit/integration coverage for readiness gating logic and API serialization of checklist/blocker fields.

## How Has This Been Tested?
